faqs.question: How does the Material Combination System work?
faqs.answer:
The material combination system intelligently merges similar materials to improve performance:

### Material Detection
- Analyzes all materials across meshes
- Identifies materials with matching properties:
  - Color values
  - Texture assignments
  - Shader settings
  - Alpha properties

### Combination Process
- Preserves original material qualities
- Merges identical textures
- Consolidates similar material settings
- Maintains UV mapping integrity

### Cleanup Process
- Removes unused material slots
- Cleans up duplicate textures
- Optimizes material assignments
- Updates mesh references

[info]This process can significantly reduce draw calls and improve performance.[/info]

[note]The system preserves visual appearance while reducing material count.[/note]

faqs.question: How does the Mesh Join System work?
faqs.answer:
The mesh join system offers two powerful methods for combining meshes:

### Join All Meshes
- Combines all avatar meshes into one
- Preserves all material assignments
- Maintains vertex groups
- Optimizes UV maps
- Fixes mesh orientation

### Join Selected Meshes
- Combines only chosen meshes
- Perfect for partial optimization
- Maintains mesh properties
- Preserves armature relationships

### Automatic Optimizations
- Fixes overlapping UVs
- Maintains shape keys
- Preserves vertex weights
- Handles material slots

[warning]Joining meshes is a permanent operation. Make a backup before proceeding.[/warning]

[note]Joined meshes often perform better in-game due to reduced draw calls.[/note]

faqs.question: How does the Remove Doubles System work?
faqs.answer:
The Remove Doubles system offers two powerful approaches for vertex optimization:

### Standard Remove Doubles
- Quick vertex merging
- Handles basic mesh cleanup
- Preserves shape keys
- Maintains UV mapping
- Automatic weight transfer

### Advanced Remove Doubles
- Progressive vertex processing
- Shape key-aware merging
- Precise distance threshold control
- Selective vertex merging
- Enhanced weight preservation

### Key Features
- Customizable merge distance
- Shape key preservation
- Weight painting protection
- UV coordinate maintenance
- Vertex group preservation

[info]Advanced mode is recommended for meshes with complex shape keys or detailed weight painting.[/info]

[warning]Always check your avatar's expressions and movements after using Remove Doubles.[/warning]

[note]This optimization can significantly reduce vertex count while maintaining model quality.[/note]
